products.name: Apple
products.description: Apples are a sweet fleshy fruit that grow around the world.

products.name: Avocado
products.description: Avocados are an interesting fruit because they are very low in carbohydrate yet high in healthy fats

products.name: Banana
products.description: The banana is a tropical fruit with a long body covered in a yellow skin.

products.name: Blackberry
products.description: Blackberries are one of the tastiest fruits around.

products.name: Cherry
products.description: Cherries are one of the most popular fruit varieties, and they are technically a drupe – a fruit with a hard stone inside.

products.name: Blueberries
products.description: Lauded for their purported health benefits, blueberries are a fruit that just about everyone considers healthy.

products.name: Cranberry
products.description: Cranberries are a small edible berry with a bright red color.

products.name: Durian
products.description: Known for its peculiar scent, the durian is a giant-sized tropical fruit that’s native to South-East Asia.

products.name: Grapes
products.description: Grapes are one of the most prevalent types of fruit, and we can find them almost everywhere.
